text: Egh nɨ gumazir ghuribar sure damu suam, me dɨpar onganir avɨribar amɨ onganan markɨ. Me arazir aghuibar amutɨ, igharaz darazi me mɨkɨm suam, me bar dera. Egh me navir ghurimɨn araziba dɨkabɨn. Me Godɨn guizɨn akam deravɨram a gɨfogh, egh arazir bar igharaz darazigh ifongezim damu, tugh gavgavigh osɨmtɨziba bar a da ater.
